name: Lila

services.title: Product Management
services.description: I am passionate about turning complex ideas into successful, user-centered products, with a particular focus in product that are usable, useful, and (of course) used.

services.title: Product Design
services.description: I'm passionate about creating intuitive, elegant product designs that delight users and solve real-world problems.

services.title: Data Science
services.description: I love to implement data-driven solutions to complex business problems, leveraging my expertise in statistics, machine learning, and data visualization.

services.title: Analytics & Strategy
services.description: I specialize in leveraging data analytics to develop strategic insights that drive business growth and improve operational efficiency.

aboutpara:
My name's Lila. I'm a Program Manager at Amazon Web Services working in Business & Product Operations. 

I graduated from Northwestern University, where I studied Sociology, Data Science, and Human Computer Interaction. I'm passionate about solving problems with data and designing solutions and products that are useful, usable, and used.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a designer and data scientist
resume.description: I'm passionate about designing solutions that make an impact, and solving problems with data. Well-versed in Python, SQL, R, HTML, CSS, JS, and most of visualization tools like Tableau. I'm also a certified Agile Scrum Master and Product Owner.

experiences.position: Program Manager, AWS Business & Product Operations
experiences.bullets: Based in the Funding Operations team
Based in the Tri-Party Initiative team, helping to build GTM solutions for software and consulting Partners.
Worked on the frontend of a React application,

education.universityPara: Graduated Magna Cum Laude (3.94 cumulative GPA) and studied Sociology, Data Science (Concentration in Python) and Human Computer Interaction
